sn35.122:4.3: Katame ca, bhikkhave, saṃyojaniyā dhammā, katamañca saṃyojanaṃ?
sn35.122:4.4: Santi, bhikkhave, cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.122:4.6: Yo tattha chandarāgo, taṃ tattha saṃyojanaṃ … pe …
sn35.122:4.8: santi, bhikkhave, manoviññeyyā dhammā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā.
sn35.122:4.10: Yo tattha chandarāgo taṃ tattha saṃyojanan”ti.
